General.Name: Teknosa Ic ve Dis Ticaret AS
General.Description: Teknosa Iç ve Dis Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the retail sale of technology products in Turkey. It sells its products through its stores; and an online store, teknosa.com, as well as air conditioners and refrigerators through its dealer network. is to do. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Teknosa Iç ve Dis Ticaret Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Haci Ömer Sabanci Holding A.S.
General.Address: Carrefoursa Plaza Cevizli Mah., Istanbul, Turkey, 34846
